author: .vbuterin
content: Log data is part of the receipt tree

author: draganrakita
content: I am passing most of them, there are few that are incorrect. Can we cleanup the eth/tests PRs and merge them, it is easier to iterate when we have it merged: https://github.com/ethereum/tests/pulls

author: draganrakita
content: Incorrect PRs are mostly opcodes that need to be disabled but they are not. I see there is PR for this: https://github.com/ethereum/tests/pull/1355

author: draganrakita
content: And second thing is (maybe i read it wrongly here) RJUMPV with a `max_index=0`  in spec it says `RJUMPV count cannot be zero` is `count` meant to represent `max_index`? In general `max_index == 0` acts as a `RJUMPI`
